Aura: Bless.name: Aura: Bless
Aura: Bless.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless}

You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls while within the emanation. Once per round on subsequent turns, you can Sustain the spell to increase the emanation's radius by 10 feet.

Effect: Guidance Immunity.name: Effect: Guidance Immunity
Effect: Guidance Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance} on you, rendering you immune to the effect of the spell for the duration.

Effect: Shield Immunity.name: Effect: Shield Immunity
Effect: Shield Immunity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}

After you use Shield Block, the spell ends and you can't cast it again for 10 minutes.

Spell Effect: Acid Grip.name: Spell Effect: Acid Grip
Spell Effect: Acid Grip.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.9h9YCncqah6VNsKf]{Acid Grip}

While you are taking persistent damage from this spell, you take a –10-foot status bonus to your Speeds.

Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Bat).name: Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Bat)
Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Bat).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{Aerial Form}

You transform into a Medium flying animal battle form. You gain the animal trait, and gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and your damage bonus is +5. These attacks are Dexterity based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} condition, for example). If your attack modifier for Dexterity-based unarmed attacks is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Bat

    • Speed 20 feet, fly Speed 30 feet; precise echolocation 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 fangs, Damage 2d8 piercing;
    • Melee 1 wing (agile), Damage 2d6 bludgeoning.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Large and your fly Speed gains a +10-foot status bonus. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 10 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +8, and Acrobatics +20.

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, your fly Speed gains a +15-foot status bonus, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +4 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Acrobatics +23.

Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Bird).name: Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Bird)
Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Bird).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{Aerial Form}

You transform into a Medium flying animal battle form. You gain the animal trait, and gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and your damage bonus is +5. These attacks are Dexterity based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} condition, for example). If your attack modifier for Dexterity-based unarmed attacks is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Bird

    • Speed 10 feet, fly Speed 50 feet;
    • Melee 1 beak, Damage 2d8 piercing;
    • Melee 1 talon (agile), Damage 1d10 slashing.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Large and your fly Speed gains a +10-foot status bonus. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 10 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +8, and Acrobatics +20.

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, your fly Speed gains a +15-foot status bonus, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +4 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Acrobatics +23.

Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Pterosaur).name: Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Pterosaur)
Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Pterosaur).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{Aerial Form}

You transform into a Medium flying animal battle form. You gain the animal trait, and gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and your damage bonus is +5. These attacks are Dexterity based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} condition, for example). If your attack modifier for Dexterity-based unarmed attacks is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Pterosaur

    • Speed 10 feet, fly Speed 40 feet; imprecise scent 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 beak, Damage 3d6 piercing.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Large and your fly Speed gains a +10-foot status bonus. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 10 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +8, and Acrobatics +20.

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, your fly Speed gains a +15-foot status bonus, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +4 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Acrobatics +23.

Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Wasp).name: Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Wasp)
Spell Effect: Aerial Form (Wasp).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{Aerial Form}

You transform into a Medium flying animal battle form. You gain the animal trait, and gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +16, and your damage bonus is +5. These attacks are Dexterity based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} condition, for example). If your attack modifier for Dexterity-based unarmed attacks is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +16, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Wasp

    • Speed 20 feet, fly Speed 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 stinger, Damage 1d8 piercing plus 1d6 persistent poison.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Large and your fly Speed gains a +10-foot status bonus. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 10 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +8, and Acrobatics +20.

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, your fly Speed gains a +15-foot status bonus, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +4 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Acrobatics +23.

Spell Effect: Akashic Download.name: Spell Effect: Akashic Download
Spell Effect: Akashic Download.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.VynaowCerc7B4yvI]{Akashic Download}

You gain a +1 status bonus on Recall Knowledge checks using your chosen skill. If you roll a critical failure on this check, you get a failure instead.

Spell Effect: Analyze Target.name: Spell Effect: Analyze Target
Spell Effect: Analyze Target.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.NkvRoN33RbDg3fl9]{Analyze Target}

You gain a status bonus to Impersonate, Treat Wounds, and Recall Knowledge about a target.

Spell Effect: Ant Haul.name: Spell Effect: Ant Haul
Spell Effect: Ant Haul.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.X9dkmh23lFwMjrYd]{Ant Haul}

You can carry 3 more Bulk than normal before becoming encumbered and up to a maximum of 6 more Bulk.

Spell Effect: Anthem.name: Spell Effect: Anthem
Spell Effect: Anthem.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.smCC1LNhMb7Z1lrU]{Anthem}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saves against effects that cause fascinated or confusion.

Spell Effect: Bane.name: Spell Effect: Bane
Spell Effect: Bane.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.7ZinJNzxq0XF0oMx]{Bane}.

You take a -1 status penalty to attack rolls.

Spell Effect: Bind Undead.name: Spell Effect: Bind Undead
Spell Effect: Bind Undead.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.GUeRTriJkMlMlVrk]{Bind Undead}

The target mindless undead creature gains the minion trait.

Spell Effect: Bless.name: Spell Effect: Bless
Spell Effect: Bless.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{Bless}

You gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.

Spell Effect: Cairn Form.name: Spell Effect: Cairn Form
Spell Effect: Cairn Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.HAaRcHfN4g83eSEC]{Cairn Form}

You gain resistance to physical damage, except adamantine, and a fist unarmed attack that deals bludgeoning damage

Spell Effect: Calm.name: Spell Effect: Calm
Spell Effect: Calm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{Calm}

You take a -1 status penalty to your attack rolls.

Spell Effect: Carcinization.name: Spell Effect: Carcinization
Spell Effect: Carcinization.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.n5a3t5Qnx5AU8auy]{Carcinization}

You transform into a crab, as it had @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form} heightened to the same rank as this spell and using the following statistics.

  • Speed 25 feet, swim 15 feet
  • Melee 1 big claw, Damage 2d8 piercing
  • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 2d4 piercing.

Spell Effect: Commune with Tech.name: Spell Effect: Commune with Tech
Spell Effect: Commune with Tech.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.dyDIRdq3QmP2QzBR]{Commune with Tech}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Hack, use, manipulate, disable, identify, Recall Knowledge about, or otherwise interact with the target.

Spell Effect: Dragon Form.name: Spell Effect: Dragon Form
Spell Effect: Dragon Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form}

You gain a Large dragon battle form. Choose one type of dragon. While in this form, you gain the dragon trait. You have hands in this battle form and can take manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.

  • 10 temporary Hit Points.

  • Speed 40 feet, fly 100 feet. You gain any of the following Speeds the chosen dragon has, but with the listed amount: burrow 20 feet, climb 40 feet, swim 60 feet.

  • Resistance 10 against the damage type of your Dragon Breath.

  • Darkvision and imprecise scent 60 feet.

  • The following unarmed melee attacks, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and your damage bonus is +6. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead. See below for more on these attacks.

    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d12 piercing plus 2d6 damage of the same damage type as your Dragon Breath;

    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d10 slashing;

    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning.

  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own is higher.

  • Dragon Breath 2 You exhale deadly magical energy in an area, dealing 10d6 damage to each creature in the area with a basic save against your spell DC. The shape, damage type, and save type match that of your chosen dragon's breath. If the chosen dragon's breath can deal more than one type of damage, choose one when you cast dragon form. The shape is a 30-foot cone or a 100-foot line. Once activated, Dragon Breath can't be used again for 1d4 rounds. Dragon Breath has the tradition trait matching the type of dragon and the damage trait matching the type of damage it deals, if applicable.

  • Tradition Resistance If the dragon's magical tradition matches that of your dragon form spell, you gain the listed ability. Arcane resistance 5 against magic; divine resistance 10 to spirit, vitality, and void; occult resistance 10 to mental; primal resistance 5 to physical damage.

Heightened (8th) Your battle form is Huge, you gain a +20-foot status bonus to your fly Speed, and your attacks have 10-foot reach (or 15-foot reach if they previously had 10-foot reach). You instead gain AC = 21 + your level, 15 temporary HP, an attack modifier of +28, a damage bonus of +12, and Athletics +28. Your Dragon Breath deals an additional 4d6 damage.

Spell Effect: Earthquake (Shaking Ground.name: Spell Effect: Earthquake (Shaking Ground)
Spell Effect: Earthquake (Shaking Ground.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]{Earthquake}

Creatures on the shaking ground take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls, AC, and skill checks.

Spell Effect: Elemental Barrier.name: Spell Effect: Elemental Barrier
Spell Effect: Elemental Barrier.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.5apI8Yamauo02VYR]{Elemental Barrier}

You gain +1 circumstance bonus to AC. While the spell is in effect, the target can use the Shield Block reaction as if the elemental barrier was a raised shield. Unlike a normal Shield Block, you can use the spell's reaction against spells with the chosen elemental trait cast against the creature.

Spell Effect: Elemental Form.name: Spell Effect: Elemental Form
Spell Effect: Elemental Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.1K6AYGisvo9gqdhs]{Elemental Form}

You transform into an elemental battle form.

Spell Effect: Energy Aegis.name: Spell Effect: Energy Aegis
Spell Effect: Energy Aegis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.m2xFMNyQiUKQDRaj]{Energy Aegis}

The target gains resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, sonic, vitality, and void damage.

Spell Effect: Enhance Body.name: Spell Effect: Enhance Body
Spell Effect: Enhance Body.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.GmeI009NbLbR6sR5]{Enhance Body}

Your unarmed attacks gain the tracking +1 trait, and increase the number of damage dice to two.

Heightened (6th) The unarmed attacks gain the tracking +2 trait, and increase the number of weapon damage dice to three.

Heightened (9th) The unarmed attacks gain the tracking +3 trait, and increase the number of weapon damage dice to four.

Spell Effect: Enhance Weapon.name: Spell Effect: Enhance Weapon
Spell Effect: Enhance Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.ahXTkKpQtOTAQOFm]{Enhance Weapon}

The target weapon becomes an advanced weapon, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two.

Heightened (6th) If the target is a commercial, tactical, advanced, or superior weapon, it becomes an elite weapon, gaining a +2 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to three.

Heightened (9th) The target becomes a paragon weapon, gaining a +3 to item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to four.

Spell Effect: Enlarge.name: Spell Effect: Enlarge
Spell Effect: Enlarge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}

You grow to size Large and are clumsy 1. Your reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if you started out Tiny), and you gain a +2 status bonus to melee damage.

Heightened (4th) You grow to size Huge. The status bonus to melee damage is +4 and your reach increases by 10 feet (or 15 feet if you started out Tiny).

Heightened (6th) Choose either the 2nd-rank or 4th-rank version of this spell.

Spell Effect: Enlarge (Heightened 4th).name: Spell Effect: Enlarge (Heightened 4th)
Spell Effect: Enlarge (Heightened 4th).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge}

Bolstered by magical power, the target grows to size Huge. Its equipment grows with it but returns to natural size if removed. The creature is clumsy 1. Its reach increases by 10 feet (or by 15 feet if it started out Tiny), and it gains a +4 status bonus to melee damage. The Spell has no effect on a Huge or larger creature.

Spell Effect: Entangling Flora.name: Spell Effect: Entangling Flora
Spell Effect: Entangling Flora.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Entangling Flora}

The creature takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.

Spell Effect: Everlight.name: Spell Effect: Everlight
Spell Effect: Everlight.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.ynm8JIU3sc3qUMpa]{Everlight}

The gemstone you touch glows, spreading bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light for the next 20 feet).

Spell Effect: False Vitality.name: Spell Effect: False Vitality
Spell Effect: False Vitality.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.8ViwItUgwT4lOvvb]{False Vitality}

You gain a number of temporary Hit Points.

Spell Effect: Figment.name: Spell Effect: Figment
Spell Effect: Figment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.0zU8CPejjQFnhZFI]{Figment}

You can attempt to Create a Diversion with the illusion, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to your Deception check.

Spell Effect: Fire Shield.name: Spell Effect: Fire Shield
Spell Effect: Fire Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.YrzBLPLd3r9m6t1p]{Fire Shield}

You gain resistance to cold damage. You can Raise a Shield with the fire shield as a normal shield to gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Spell Effect: Fleet Step.name: Spell Effect: Fleet Step
Spell Effect: Fleet Step.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.aEM2cttJ2eYcLssW]{Fleet Step}

You gain a +30-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Flicker.name: Spell Effect: Flicker
Spell Effect: Flicker.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.zR67Rt3UMHKC5evy]{Flicker}

You gain resistance to all damage, except force.

Spell Effect: Fly.name: Spell Effect: Fly
Spell Effect: Fly.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet, whichever is greater.

Spell Effect: Forbidding Ward.name: Spell Effect: Forbidding Ward
Spell Effect: Forbidding Ward.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.RA7VKcen3p56rVyZ]{Forbidding Ward}

You gain a status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws against the target enemy's attacks, spells, and other effects.

Spell Effect: Foresight.name: Spell Effect: Foresight
Spell Effect: Foresight.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.qsNeG9KZpODSACMq]{Foresight}

You gain a +2 status bonus to initiative rolls and aren't off-guard against undetected creatures or when flanked.

Spell Effect: Frostbite.name: Spell Effect: Frostbite
Spell Effect: Frostbite.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.IxhGEKl63R4QBvkj]{Frostbite}

The target gains weakness to bludgeoning equal to the spell rank.

Spell Effect: Glow Up.name: Spell Effect: Glow Up
Spell Effect: Glow Up.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.V1cojmrEOWkJ1yPF]{Glow Up}

You gain a status bonus to Diplomacy checks to Make an Impression and add your level to Diplomacy checks if untrained.

Spell Effect: Guidance.name: Spell Effect: Guidance
Spell Effect: Guidance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}

You gain a +1 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check you attempt. You choose which roll to use the bonus on before rolling.

Spell Effect: Haste.name: Spell Effect: Haste
Spell Effect: Haste.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{Haste}

You gain the quickened condition and can use the extra action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

Spell Effect: Heroism.name: Spell Effect: Heroism
Spell Effect: Heroism.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.KqvqNAfGIE5a9wSv]{Heroism}

You gain a status bonus to attack rolls, Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks.

Spell Effect: Honeyed Words.name: Spell Effect: Honeyed Words
Spell Effect: Honeyed Words.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.JyxTmqjYYn63V5LY]{Honeyed Words}

You gain a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to Lie, and you add your level even if untrained.

Spell Effect: Humanoid Form.name: Spell Effect: Humanoid Form
Spell Effect: Humanoid Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.2qGqa33E4GPUCbMV]{Humanoid Form}

You transform your appearance to that of a Small or Medium humanoid. You gain the humanoid trait. If this transformation reduces your size, it reduces your reach accordingly (typically to 5 feet). You gain a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to pass as a generic member of the chosen ancestry, and you add your level even if you're untrained, but you can't make yourself look like a specific person.

Heightened (3rd) You gain darkvision or low-light vision if the form you assume has that ability.

Heightened (5th) You can take on the appearance of a Large humanoid. If this increases your size, you gain the effects of the enlarge spell.

Spell Effect: Ill Omen.name: Spell Effect: Ill Omen
Spell Effect: Ill Omen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.6ZIKB0151LUR19Rw]{Ill Omen}

When you attempt an attack roll or skill check, you must roll twice and use the worse result the first time on a Failure or throughout the duration if it was a Critical Failure.

Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise.name: Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise
Spell Effect: Illusory Disguise.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise}

The target receives a +4 status bonus to Deception checks to prevent others from seeing through the disguise, and lets the target add its level to such Deception checks even if untrained.

Spell Effect: Infuse Vitality.name: Spell Effect: Infuse Vitality
Spell Effect: Infuse Vitality.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.2iQKhCQBijhj5Rf3]{Infuse Vitality}

Your unarmed and weapon Strikes deal extra vitality damage.

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Ant).name: Spell Effect: Insect Form (Ant)
Spell Effect: Insect Form (Ant).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}

You transform into a Medium animal battle form. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +13, and your damage bonus is +2. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +13, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Ant

    • Speed 30 feet, climb Speed 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 mandibles, Damage 2d6 bludgeoning.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +6, and Athletics +16.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +2 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Athletics +20.

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Beetle).name: Spell Effect: Insect Form (Beetle)
Spell Effect: Insect Form (Beetle).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}

You envision a simple bug and transform into a Medium animal battle form. When you cast this spell, choose a form.

You can decide the specific type of animal (such as such as a ladybug or scarab for beetle), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You can Dismiss this spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +13, and your damage bonus is +2. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +13, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Beetle
    • Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 mandibles, Damage 2d10 bludgeoning.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +6, and Athletics +16.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +2 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Athletics +20.

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Centipede).name: Spell Effect: Insect Form (Centipede)
Spell Effect: Insect Form (Centipede).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}

You transform into a Medium animal battle form. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +13, and your damage bonus is +2. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +13, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Centipede

    • Speed 25 feet, climb Speed 25 feet; darkvision;
    • Melee 1 mandibles, Damage 1d8 piercing plus 1d4 persistent poison.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +6, and Athletics +16.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +2 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Athletics +20.

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Mantis).name: Spell Effect: Insect Form (Mantis)
Spell Effect: Insect Form (Mantis).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}

You transform into a Medium animal battle form. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +13, and your damage bonus is +2. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +13, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Mantis

    • Speed 40 feet; imprecise scent 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 foreleg, Damage 2d8 bludgeoning.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +6, and Athletics +16.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +2 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Athletics +20.

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Scorpion).name: Spell Effect: Insect Form (Scorpion)
Spell Effect: Insect Form (Scorpion).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}

You transform into a Medium animal battle form. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +13, and your damage bonus is +2. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +13, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Scorpion

    • Speed 40 feet; darkvision, imprecise tremorsense 60 feet;
    • Melee 1 stinger, Damage 1d8 piercing plus 1d4 persistent poison;
    • Melee 1 pincer (agile), Damage 1d6 bludgeoning.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +6, and Athletics +16.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +2 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Athletics +20.

Spell Effect: Insect Form (Spider).name: Spell Effect: Insect Form (Spider)
Spell Effect: Insect Form (Spider).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.XI6Lzd2B5pernkPd]{Insect Form}

You transform into a Medium animal battle form. While in this form, you gain the animal trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 10 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +13, and your damage bonus is +2. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +13, unless your own is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the form you choose:

  • Spider

    • Speed 25 feet, climb Speed 25 feet; darkvision;
    • Melee 1 fangs, Damage 1d6 piercing plus 1d4 persistent poison;
    • Ranged 1 web (range increment 20 feet), Damage entangles the target for 1 round.

Heightened (4th) Your battle form is Large, and your attacks have 10-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 15 temporary HP, attack modifier +16, damage bonus +6, and Athletics +16.

Heightened (5th) Your battle form is Huge, and your attacks have 15-foot reach. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. You instead gain 20 temporary HP, attack modifier +18, damage bonus +2 and double damage dice (including persistent damage), and Athletics +20.

Spell Effect: Knock.name: Spell Effect: Knock
Spell Effect: Knock.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.6Ot4N22t5tPD51BO]{Knock}

You gain a +4 status bonus to open the target door, lock, or container with an Athletics or a Thievery check.

Spell Effect: Levitate.name: Spell Effect: Levitate
Spell Effect: Levitate.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.fI20AVwOzJMHXRdo]{Levitate}.

You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls while floating in the air. You can spend an Interact action to stabilize yourself and negate this penalty for the remainder of the turn.

Spell Effect: Light.name: Spell Effect: Light
Spell Effect: Light.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light}

You attach an orb of light to a willing creature, causing it to float near that creature as it moves.

Spell Effect: Motivating Ringtone.name: Spell Effect: Motivating Ringtone
Spell Effect: Motivating Ringtone.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.5ZZca1GGJs44OxC8]{Motivating Ringtone}

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to all Speeds, and a +1 status bonus to saves against fear effects.

Spell Effect: Mountain Resilience.name: Spell Effect: Mountain Resilience
Spell Effect: Mountain Resilience.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{Mountain Resilience}

You gain resistance to physical damage, except adamantine.

Spell Effect: Mystic Armor.name: Spell Effect: Mystic Armor
Spell Effect: Mystic Armor.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mystic Armor}

You gain an item bonus to AC and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. At 4th rank or higher, you gain an item bonus to saving throws.

Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate.name: Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate
Spell Effect: Nature Incarnate.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.ZXwxs5tRjEGrjAJT]{Nature Incarnate}

You transform into an incarnation of nature, either a green man or a kaiju. Your battle form is Medium for a green man or Gargantuan (30-foot-by-30-foot space) for a kaiju. While in this form, you gain the plant trait (for a green man) or the beast trait (for a kaiju). You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +36, unless your own is higher.

You gain specific abilities based on the incarnation you choose:

  • Green Man

    • Speed 40 feet, climb 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 vines (reach 30 feet, versatile P), Damage 6d8+12 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 thorns (range 100 feet), Damage 6d6+6 piercing;
    • Green Caress (aura, primal) 60 feet. Enemies other than plants must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|against:spell] against your spell DC or become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} on a critical failure).

  • Kaiju

    • Speed 50 feet; resistance 5 to physical damage;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 30 feet), Damage 6d10+10 piercing;
    • Melee 1 claws (agile, reach 30 feet), Damage 6d8+8 slashing;
    • Melee 1 foot (agile, reach 15 feet), Damage 6d6+10 bludgeoning;
    • Unstoppable You are immune to being @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;
    • Trample 3 You move up to double your Speed and move through the spaces of Huge or smaller creatures, trampling each creature whose space you enter. A trampled creature takes foot damage with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC.

Spell Effect: Oaken Resilience.name: Spell Effect: Oaken Resilience
Spell Effect: Oaken Resilience.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{Oaken Resilience}

You gain resistance to bludgeoning and piercing damage and weakness to fire.

Spell Effect: Pest Form.name: Spell Effect: Pest Form
Spell Effect: Pest Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.gfPjmG6Fe6D3MFjl]{Pest Form}

You transform into the battle form of a Tiny animal. While in this form, you gain the animal trait and you can't make Strikes. You gain the following statistics and abilities:

  • AC = 15 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • Speed 20 feet.
  • Weakness 5 to physical damage. (If you take physical damage in this form, you take 5 additional damage.)
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • Acrobatics and Stealth modifiers of +10, unless your own modifier is higher; Athletics modifier -4.

Heightened (4th) You can turn into a flying creature, such as a bird, which grants you a fly Speed of 20 feet.

Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal).name: Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal)
Spell Effect: Plant Form (Arboreal).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}

You transform into a Large plant battle form. While in this form, you gain the plant trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 12 temporary Hit Points.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +17, and your damage bonus is +11. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +19, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of plant you choose:

  • Arboreal

    • Speed 30 feet; you can speak in this form, but you still can't Cast a Spell or supply verbal components.
    • Melee 1 branch (reach 15 feet), Damage 2d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 foot, Damage 2d8 bludgeoning

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 24 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +16, and Athletics +22.

Spell Effect: Plant Form (Flytrap).name: Spell Effect: Plant Form (Flytrap)
Spell Effect: Plant Form (Flytrap).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}

You transform into a Large plant battle form. While in this form, you gain the plant trait. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 19 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 12 temporary Hit Points.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Low-light vision.
  • One or more unarmed melee attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can Strike with. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +17, and your damage bonus is +11. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled} condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +19, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of plant you choose:

  • Flytrap

    • Speed 15 feet; resistance 10 to acid;
    • Melee 1 leaf (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8 piercing, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.

Heightened (6th) Your battle form is Huge, and the reach of your attacks increases by 5 feet. You instead gain AC = 22 + your level, 24 temporary HP, attack modifier +21, damage bonus +16, and Athletics +22.

Spell Effect: Promession.name: Spell Effect: Promession
Spell Effect: Promession.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.xS4bqHnbodCwjpqI]{Promession}

You get a result one degree of success worse on your Fortitude save.

Spell Effect: Protection.name: Spell Effect: Protection
Spell Effect: Protection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.gMODOGamz88rgHuf]{Protection}.

You gain a +1 status bonus to Armor Class and saving throws.

Spell Effect: Quantum Analysis.name: Spell Effect: Quantum Analysis
Spell Effect: Quantum Analysis.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.v8JA4sG2tsVP2gOM]{Quantum Analysis}

Creatures you target can't benefit from circumstance bonuses to AC due to cover against your attacks. You also ignore circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat checks required due to the creature being concealed, hidden, or behind cover.

The first time after casting this spell when you make an attack roll against a creature within your quantum field, you roll twice and use the better result.

Spell Effect: Quantum Analysis (Cover Su.name: Spell Effect: Quantum Analysis (Cover Suppression)
Spell Effect: Quantum Analysis (Cover Su.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.v8JA4sG2tsVP2gOM]{Quantum Analysis} via Ephemeral Effect

You can't benefit from circumstance bonuses to AC due to cover against the origin's attacks.

Spell Effect: Quantum Analysis (Fortune).name: Spell Effect: Quantum Analysis (Fortune)
Spell Effect: Quantum Analysis (Fortune).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.v8JA4sG2tsVP2gOM]{Quantum Analysis}

When you make an attack roll against a creature within your quantum field, you roll twice and use the better result.

Spell Effect: Read Aura.name: Spell Effect: Read Aura
Spell Effect: Read Aura.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.OhD2Z6rIGGD5ocZA]{Read Aura}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Identify Magic.

Spell Effect: Regenerate.name: Spell Effect: Regenerate
Spell Effect: Regenerate.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.2Vkd1IxylPceUAAF]{Regenerate}

The target gains regeneration, which restores Hit Points to it at the start of each of its turns.

Spell Effect: Resist Energy.name: Spell Effect: Resist Energy
Spell Effect: Resist Energy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy}

Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. You gain resistance against the damage type you chose.

Spell Effect: See the Unseen.name: Spell Effect: See the Unseen
Spell Effect: See the Unseen.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See the Unseen}

You can see invisible creatures as though they weren't invisible, although their features are blurred, making them @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} and difficult to identify. You also gain a +2 status bonus to checks you make to disbelieve illusions.

Spell Effect: Shield.name: Spell Effect: Shield
Spell Effect: Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. While the spell is in effect, you can use the Shield Block reaction with your magic shield. After you use Shield Block, the spell ends.

Spell Effect: Shifting Surge.name: Spell Effect: Shifting Surge
Spell Effect: Shifting Surge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.7P4eBdqWcgQJAFCa]{Shifting Surge}

The next Strike the weapon makes deals your choice of acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage, and deals an additional 1d6 extra damage of the same type as the weapon's normal damage.

Spell Effect: Shrink.name: Spell Effect: Shrink
Spell Effect: Shrink.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.PjhUmyKnq6K5uDby]{Shrink}

You shrink to become Tiny in size. Your equipment shrinks with you but returns to its original size if removed. Your reach changes to 0 feet.

Spell Effect: Shuffle Repeat.name: Spell Effect: Shuffle Repeat
Spell Effect: Shuffle Repeat.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.AlYzxLKWZujnzsjJ]{Shuffle Repeat}

You deal an additional die of sonic damage and gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves and Will DCs.

Spell Effect: Silence.name: Spell Effect: Silence
Spell Effect: Silence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence}

You make no sound, preventing creatures from noticing you using hearing alone.

Heightened (4th) The spell creates an aura in a 10-foot emanation around you, silencing all sound in or passing through it. While within the aura, creatures are subject to the same effects as the target.

Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (3rd-Rank).name: Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (3rd-Rank)
Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (3rd-Rank).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.VmtQlZqeraTv0Eer]{Skyfire Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet. Your wings are unarmed attacks that deal 1d8 fire damage and has the backswing, reach, and unarmed traits; On a critical hit, a target of your wing attack takes 2 persistent electricity damage.

Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (5th-Rank).name: Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (5th-Rank)
Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (5th-Rank).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.VmtQlZqeraTv0Eer]{Skyfire Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet. Your wings are unarmed attacks that deal 2d8 fire damage and has the backswing, reach, and unarmed traits; On a critical hit, a target of your wing attack takes 4 persistent electricity damage.

Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (7th-Rank).name: Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (7th-Rank)
Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (7th-Rank).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.VmtQlZqeraTv0Eer]{Skyfire Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet. Your wings are unarmed attacks that deal 3d8 fire damage and has the backswing, reach, and unarmed traits; On a critical hit, a target of your wing attack takes 6 persistent electricity damage.

Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (9th-Rank).name: Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (9th-Rank)
Spell Effect: Skyfire Wings (9th-Rank).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.VmtQlZqeraTv0Eer]{Skyfire Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed or 20 feet. Your wings are unarmed attacks that deal 4d8 fire damage and has the backswing, reach, and unarmed traits; On a critical hit, a target of your wing attack takes 8 persistent electricity damage.

Spell Effect: Soothe.name: Spell Effect: Soothe
Spell Effect: Soothe.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.szIyEsvihc5e1w8n]{Soothe}

You gain a +2 status bonus to saves against mental effects.

Spell Effect: Subjective Reality.name: Spell Effect: Subjective Reality
Spell Effect: Subjective Reality.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.CptKtBneM7od45nc]{Subjective Reality}

You gain resistance to all damage originating from the target equal to your level.

Spell Effect: Supercharge Weapon.name: Spell Effect: Supercharge Weapon
Spell Effect: Supercharge Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.SbBqa1HStMrV47fb]{Supercharge Weapon}

The next Strike made using that weapon is supercharged. That Strike deals an additional 1d6 damage of the same type as the weapon's normal damage.

Spell Effect: Sure Strike.name: Spell Effect: Sure Strike
Spell Effect: Sure Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{Sure Strike}

The next time you make an attack roll, roll twice and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being Concealed or Hidden.

Spell Effect: Tailwind.name: Spell Effect: Tailwind
Spell Effect: Tailwind.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.KcLVELhCUcKXxiKE]{Tailwind}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Tailwind (8 hours).name: Spell Effect: Tailwind (8 hours)
Spell Effect: Tailwind (8 hours).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.KcLVELhCUcKXxiKE]{Tailwind}

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Tangle Vine.name: Spell Effect: Tangle Vine
Spell Effect: Tangle Vine.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{Tangle Vine}

You take a –10-foot circumstance penalty to your Speeds. On a critical success, you are also immobilized.

Spell Effect: Tech Intuition.name: Spell Effect: Tech Intuition
Spell Effect: Tech Intuition.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.A09nTb61ceLF27vX]{Tech Intuition}

You roll triggering check twice and use the better result.

Spell Effect: True Target.name: Spell Effect: True Target
Spell Effect: True Target.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.AlbpWWN87yGegoAF]{True Target}

For your next attack roll against the marked creature, roll twice and use the better result. You ignore circumstance penalties to the attack roll.

Spell Effect: Unfettered Movement.name: Spell Effect: Unfettered Movement
Spell Effect: Unfettered Movement.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Unfettered Movement}

You ignore circumstance penalties to your Speed.

Spell Effect: Vague Idea.name: Spell Effect: Vague Idea
Spell Effect: Vague Idea.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.8FT564z5zMQVZNih]{Vague Idea}

You gain a circumstance bonus on all checks to Recall Knowledge.

Spell Effect: Vapor Form.name: Spell Effect: Vapor Form
Spell Effect: Vapor Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{Vapor Form}

You lose any item bonus to your AC, gain resistance 8 to physical damage, immunity to precision damage, and a fly Speed of 10 feet.

Spell Effect: Vital Beacon.name: Spell Effect: Vital Beacon
Spell Effect: Vital Beacon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.ikSb3LRGnrwXJBVX]{Vital Beacon}

Either you or an ally can use an Interact action to supplicate and lay hands upon you to regain @Damage[(@item.level)d((2+2*@item.badge.value))[healing,vitality]|shortLabel] Hit Points. This healing decreases each time the beacon heals someone.

Spell Effect: Void Seed.name: Spell Effect: Void Seed
Spell Effect: Void Seed.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.FIW0VpGULprL2u8J]{Void Seed}

You gain the void healing ability. If you would be healed by a non-void effect with the healing trait, you take damage instead.

Spell Effect: Void Vessel.name: Spell Effect: Void Vessel
Spell Effect: Void Vessel.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.sTpdXXaaKhoGOIxh]{Void Vessel}

You gain the cosmic trait and a 30-feet fly Speed.

Spell Effect: Wild Bond.name: Spell Effect: Wild Bond
Spell Effect: Wild Bond.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.ssOpTABjuHAqNTPu]{Wild Bond}

You gain one of the following abilities:

  • A burrow Speed of 15 feet
  • A climb Speed of 20 feet
  • A fly Speed of 20 feet
  • A swim Speed of 25 feet
  • A Speed of 40 feet
  • A jaw unarmed attack that deals 1d8 piercing damage
  • A claw unarmed attack that deals 1d6 slashing damage and has the agile and finesse traits
  • Darkvision
